course.subject: FINA
course.name: Behavioral Finance
course.description: This course discusses behavioral finance concepts. Topics include traditional finance approach, behavioral finance approach, limits to arbitrage and market anomalies, psychological foundations in cognition, emotion and social forces, and heuristics and behavioral biases.

reviews.author: Zach
reviews.comment_content: A mix of psychology and traditional finance concepts -not the most useful content for work in the real world IMO, but a rare gem for grade boosting
reviews.comment_teaching: Despite the constant slide reading, he is very willing to clarify and  go through any confusions you might have regarding the concepts covered in class
reviews.comment_grading: Grading is fair, just make sure you leave enough time to cover all the materials taught before the final
reviews.comment_workload: Workload is small, only comprises of a group case study and a final exam which are all MCQs.
